title: What is the meaning of the 'vaat disu de' song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is an attempt at poetic translation this beautiful song… वाट दिसू दे गा देवा वाट दिसू द वाट दिसू दे गा देवा गाठ सुटू देLet me see the way, Oh LordLet me see the wayLet me see the way, Oh LordLet the knots fall away संग सोबतीची साथ मग दिवा बित रातआज पहाटच्या पावलालाश्वास फुटू देLike a wick & lamp at nightFriends' friendships stayLet life be breathed intoA new step, of the dawn today हिरव्या दाण्याचं दान दिल त्यानओसाडाच रान झाल जीआर मातीच्या पोटात आस्मानच बळमाऊलीची लाज राख जीHe gave the grain of the greenArid land into forest, He did turn overEarth's belly has might of sky withinPlease, don't let down that mother या मिणमिणत्या दिव्याला तू साकड घालया तळमळत्या जीवाला दे जाणीव होऊनया धगधगत्या निखाऱ्याला मायेची ओलया रखरखत्या भुईला दे घामाचं मोलLet this flickering flame be blessedLet this striving life get a comprehensionLet this smoldering fire be lovingly drizzledTo wasteland, let the price of its sweat be given पुरी जिंदगी पेरली उधळुन जिंदगानीकुणब्याच सार रान आबादान हसू देAll my energy is sowed inAll my life here is laid inLord, let forest of this peasantBe flourishing and smiling वाट दिसू दे गा देवा वाट दिसू दे वाट दिसू दे गा देवा गाठ सुटू देLet me see the way, Oh LordLet me see the wayLet me see the way, Oh LordLet the knots fall away भल्याची पुण्याई उभी तुझ्या मागजरा निगतीन वाग जीआर्र ढळून इमान लागू नये डागदिल्या सबुदाला जाग जीBy blessings of sages feel protectedKeep up the righteousness Don’t let integrity be blemishedDon’t forget the proof of His grace या सळसळत्या वादळाला आल उधाणया लखलखत्या आभाळाचं चांदण न्यारया रगरगत्या उन्हान चेतवलं भानया कोसळत्या पावसाची अनादी काळThe windy storm is raving on The starry sky has a unique shineThe burning sun has switched us onThe rain crashing thru endless time शुध्द निरामय सत्वाचा परिमळया अरुपाच रूप आरशात दिसू देवाट दिसू दे गा देवावाट दिसू देवाट दिसू दे गा देवागाठ सुटू देSpotless, essence of truth is pureIts formless face, let it be seen thru mirror Let me see the way, Oh LordLet me see the wayLet me see the way, Oh LordLet the knots fall away

English translation Vaat Disu De Lyrics in Marathi Wait see Let's see the watt Wait see With the help of Deshad Sobatiyi Then the lamp stayed late night Today's footprint Dilshan's heart donates milk and milk Osadach ran jhal ji R. Soil Power Mauli's ashamed ash Take this minimana lamp and make a round Becoming aware of this thirsty life This blinking faint smiles The maintenance of this maintenance ground floor Furious Life Give pleasure Puri jindagi parli uthalun jindagani Kubaniya Saran Rana Abadan Laughter Wait see Let's see the watt Wait see Give away Your way is upright Just nigatin vaag ji Impression should not be applied to scarf Given that you are awake Dissimilize this turbulent storm Chandan Nayar of this lightning sky Or is he consciously thinking about Chetawala? The dawn of the torrential rain The virtue of purity Or look like a mirror in the form of a mirror Wait see Let's see the watt Wait see Give away Found on line but can’t help with the interpretation.
